item.title: Alpine Linux + XFCE + Remmina
item.description: Why? I wanted to remote desktop my home machine through a low spec VM (via zerotier). The best way I was able to achieve it was using Alpine Linux with XFCE and Remmina Steps Step 1: Download Alpine Whatever way to you are happy with - https://www.alpinelinux.org/ Step 2: Install XFCE https://wiki.alpinelinux.org/wiki/Xfce Step 3: Install Remmina (and FreeRDP - dependencies) apk add remmina apk add freerdp Step 4: Enjoy
